addUserWizard.heading: Invite Parent Users
addUserWizard.description: Invite users from the parent organization.
addUserWizard.hint: Invited users are managed by the parent organization.

username.label: Usernames
username.hint: Add the username of a parent user and press enter. Repeat to include multiple users.

validations.required: At least one user should be selected.

groups.label: Groups
groups.hint: Assign groups for the user that is being invited.

emptyPlaceholder.noPendingInvitations: There are no pending invitations at the moment.
emptyPlaceholder.noExpiredInvitations: There are expired invitations at the moment.
emptyPlaceholder.noInvitations: There are no invitations at the moment.
emptyPlaceholder.noCollaboratorUserInvitations: There are no collaborator users with expired invitations at the moment.
